description: Manage OVH (French European hosting provider) LoadBalancing IP backends

endpoint.description: The endpoint to use ( for instance ovh-eu)

name.description: Name of the LoadBalancing internal name (ip-X.X.X.X)

weight.description: Determines the weight for this backend

probe.description: Determines the type of probe to use for this backend

state.description: Determines whether the backend is to be created/modified or deleted

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds used to wait for a task to be completed.

backend.description: The IP address of the backend to update / modify / delete
